item.title: About
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
We create digital branding 
experience

Who we are

We are a new Branding Agency. Over 20 years of combined experience, and know a thing or two about designing websites and mobile apps. Clever use of technology and lean processes enable us to work faster and smarter.

In Short

Our History

An award-winning design and development team that is proud of our work and love the web. We use an agile approach to test assumptions and connect with the needs of your audience early and often.

Our Mission

Technology enables great experiences. We like and use technology but we have tried hard to not fall in love with it. Clever use of technology and lean processes enable us to work faster and smarter.

Our Principles

As an independent insurance agency, we can always give our clients options. We are not tied to any one carrier or company, we do not serve the interests of any corporate entity.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
We provide the best services 
in the industry

WEB & UI/UX DESIGN

Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production of all web.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Web development is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet.

SEO & MARKETING

A process of affecting the visibility of a website or a web page in a web search engine's unpaid results.

MOBILE DESIGN

As part of the development process, mobile UI design is also essential in the creation of mobile apps.

MOBILE DEVELOPMENT

Mobile development - term used to denote the act or process by which application software.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

Graphic design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of illustration.

PRODUCT STRATEGY

While the product strategy outlines the elements of the product and the company's target market.

PHOTOGRAPHY

Photography is the science, art, application and practice of creating durable images by recording light.

Outstanding job and exceeded all expectations. It was a pleasure to work with them on a sizable first project and am looking forward to start the next one asap.

Michael Hopkins

and medium sized projects.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
Contact Info

Let us know what you're looking for in an agency. We'll take a look and see if this could be the start of something beautiful. Please get in touch and let’s schedule time to talk!

Phone

+44 987 065 908

Address

10111 Santa Monica Boulevard, LA

Email

info@skylith.com

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name class:form-control placeholder "Your Name"]
[email* your-email class:form-control placeholder "Your Email"]
[text* your-subject class:form-control placeholder "Your Title"]
[textarea* your-message x8 class:form-control placeholder "Your Comment"]
1 Skylith Dark Split Portfolio "[your-subject]" [your-name] noreply@nkdev.info From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Skylith Dark Split Portfolio (https://wp.nkdev.info/skylith/demo-dark-split-portfolio) Reply-To: [your-email] Skylith Dark Split Portfolio "[your-subject]" Skylith Dark Split Portfolio [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Skylith Dark Split Portfolio (https://wp.nkdev.info/skylith/demo-dark-split-portfolio) Reply-To: nkdevinfo@gmail.com Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid. demo_mode: on
